1.text: Place your index/pointer finger on the first and second strings on the first fret.

2.text: Place your middle finger on the third string on the second fret.

3.text: Place your ring finger on the fourth string on the third fret.

4.text: Practice picking and strumming the bottom four strings.
4.vid: /5/58/Play the F Chord on Guitar Step 4 Version 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Graduate to the open F, or the "old school F," for a fuller, richer chord.
5.vid: /e/e9/Play the F Chord on Guitar Step 5 Version 4.360p.mp4

6.text: Place your first finger on the first and second strings on the first fret.

7.text: Place your second finger on the third string on the second fret.

8.text: Place your fourth finger on the fourth string on the third fret.

9.text: Place your third finger on the fifth string on the third fret.

11.text: Place the rest of your fingers.

12.vid: /9/95/Play the F Chord on Guitar Step 12 Version 4.360p.mp4

13.vid: /a/a3/Play the F Chord on Guitar Step 13 Version 4.360p.mp4
